item.title: Homebrew / Whitelist Hyper-V R2 home server NAS
item.description: For my home lab i was looking for a home server with NAS functionality. My current Iomega IX2 (2x500GB) NAS is replaced by this server. For this server I had the following requirements Low power consumption (24x7) Low noise Flexibly and room to expand with extra hard drive(s),hardware RAID and a NIC Home server functionality for sharing photos, music, documents and films NAS functionality with iSCSI and NFS protocol FTP server Hypervisor enabled Backup server Print server Active Directory DNS server Download server Wake-on-LAN functionality to start other virtualization hosts I selected the following components:
